title: Bug 110566: Wrong data set result returned when an invalid filter expression 'row[0]' is set
description: When attempting to set a filter using the expression 'row[0] equals 0', the system either returns an incorrect data set result or returns a null result set.
OB: When setting a filter in the data set with the expression 'row[0] equals to ', and then clicking on the Preview tab, the first result record is returned.
EB: As the developer mentioned, the expression 'row[0]' can only be generated after all the data has been fetched. Therefore, 'row[0]' cannot be used as a filter expression.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Set a filter in the data set with the expression 'row[0] equals to ' 
2. Click on the Preview tab
